name: Magical Mystery Cure
description:
Magical Mystery Cure is a light magical crafting game with some visual novel elements. This game was made during Queerly Represent Me's Game Jam.

Article Features: PC Gamer, J Station X

Features

  • Light crafting elements - combine 3 mystical ingredients at a time to magically change Ella's face
  • 2 types of endings
  • 3 unique and original music tracks
  • Delightfully witty banter
  • All-original artwork
  • Cute furries

Story

It's Ella's birthday today, and her sweet partner Nari has invited her over for a lunch date at their cottage before the big party.  All is going well until Nari's ever-hungry cat, Squidbucket, accidentally knocks over a potion while he was trying to get to Ella's food. The contents of the potion seep into Ella's meal and before Nari can say or do something, Ella takes a bite of the now-enchanted food.

POOF!

When the smoke clears, Nari finds that something's wrong with their GF's face, well, all of it actually.  Before Ella's birthday party starts Nari has to find the right combination of ingredients to get her face back to normal!

Characters

Nari (genderfluid - 23 - she/they) - The player's character. A young witch-in-training who lives in a cluttered cottage. She's dating Ella. 

Ella (trans woman - 22 - she/her) -  The unfortunate one whose face may never be the same. An oracle of the stars. She's dating Nari.

Squidbucket the Cat (he/him) - Nari's small cat with a large appetite.

Credits

Programming: Tor

Writing/Programming: Lin

Music: Nick

Artwork/Character Design: dotoriii

Check out the concept art & assets here!

Thank you for playing!!!
